# Type Alias: DeepRecordValues\<T, TKey, TRecord\>

```ts
type DeepRecordValues<T, TKey, TRecord> = TRecord extends any ? TKey extends keyof TRecord ? TRecord[TKey & keyof TRecord] : never : never;
```
